API Collection# Opening a File (Legacy)

## [Topics](/documentation/WebKit/opening-a-file-legacy#topics)

### [Opening a File (Legacy)](/documentation/WebKit/opening-a-file-legacy#Opening-a-File-Legacy)

[`protocol WebOpenPanelResultListener`](/documentation/webkit/webopenpanelresultlistener)`WebView` user interface delegates that implement the webView:runOpenPanelForFileButtonWithResultListener: method use the methods defined in this protocol to communicate with the listener object. The methods allow the delegate to send a cancel message, or set the selected file name.Deprecated## [See Also](/documentation/WebKit/opening-a-file-legacy#see-also)
